# Street Trees in NYC:

#### Based on data from the NYC Parks Department's 2016 Street Tree Census and the 2020 U.S. Census Bureau Income Data

### This map shows the density of street trees in NYC, and the poorest census tracts are highlighted in blue.

The map can also be accessed [**here**](https://hunter.maps.arcgis.com/apps/dashboards/b12f5307e26c4ba59703ee841a574670)
